# Direct prior

```{r}
stick_break <- function(l, alpha, beta) {
  q <- rbeta(l, shape1 = alpha, shape2 = beta)
  q <- c(head(q, -1), 1)
  q * c(1, cumprod(1 - head(q, -1)))
}

nu_prior <- function(nu0 = 1) {
  sample_P0 <- function(l) rnorm(l, mean = 20, sd = 3)
  list(sample_P0 = sample_P0, nu0 = nu0)
}

nu_posterior <- function(x, nu0 = 1) {
  prior <- nu_prior(nu0)
  sample_P0 <- function(l) {
    i <- rbernoulli(l, p = nu0 / (nu0 + length(x)))
    i * prior$sample_P0(l) + (1 - i) * sample(x, l, replace = TRUE)
  }
  list(sample_P0 = sample_P0, nu0 = nu0 + length(x))
}

sample_nu <- function(l, nu) {
  x <- nu$sample_P0(l)
  p <- stick_break(l, 1, nu$nu0)
  tibble(x = x, p = p)
}

plot_distribution <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    arrange(x) %>%
    mutate(p = cumsum(p)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x, p)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(x = 'Velocity', y = 'Sample CDF')
}
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

tibble(nu0 = c(1, 10, 100)) %>%
  mutate(data = map(nu0, ~ sample_nu(l = 10000, nu = nu_prior(.x)))) %>%
  unnest(data) %>%
  mutate(nu0 = str_c('Volume = ', nu0)) %>%
  group_by(nu0) %>%
  plot_distribution() +
  facet_wrap(vars(nu0), ncol = 1)
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

tibble(nu0 = c(1, 10, 100)) %>%
  mutate(data = map(nu0, ~ sample_nu(l = 10000,
                                     nu = nu_posterior(data$Velocity, .x)))) %>%
  unnest(data) %>%
  mutate(nu0 = str_c('Volume = ', nu0)) %>%
  group_by(nu0) %>%
  plot_distribution() +
  facet_wrap(vars(nu0), ncol = 1)
```

# Mixing prior

```{r}
sample_P0_prior <- function(l, mu0 = 0, n0 = 1, alpha0 = 1, beta0 = 0.5) {
  tau <- rgamma(l, alpha0, beta0)
  mu <- rnorm(l, mu0, n0 * tau)
  tibble(mu = mu, tau = tau)
}

sample_P0_posterior <- function(l, x, mu0 = 0, n0 = 1, alpha0 = 1, beta0 = 0.5) {
  n1 <- length(x)
  if (n1 == 0) {
    mu1 <- 0
    s1 <- 0
  } else {
    mu1 <- mean(x)
    s1 <- (x - mu1)^2 / n1
  }
  sample_P0_prior(
    l = l,
    mu0 = n0 * mu0 / (n0 + n1) + n1 * mu1 / (n0 + n1),
    n0 = n0 + n1,
    alpha0 = alpha0 + n1 / 2,
    beta0 = beta0 + 0.5 * (n0 * n1 * (mu1 - mu0)^2 / (n0 + n1) + n1 * s1)
  )
}

evaluate_P1 <- function(x, theta) {
  pnorm(x, theta$mu, sqrt(1 / theta$tau))
}

update_k <- function(x, state) {
  p <- rep(state$p, state$n)
  x <- rep(x, each = state$m)
  theta <- state$theta %>% slice(rep(seq(state$m), state$n))
  p <- matrix(p * evaluate_P1(x, theta), nrow = state$m, ncol = state$n)
  p <- p / colSums(p)
  apply(p, 2, function(p) sample(seq(state$m), 1, prob = p))
}

update_p <- function(x, state) {
  counts <- as.data.frame(table(state$k))
  i <- counts[ , 1]
  i <- as.numeric(levels(i))[i]
  n <- rep(0, state$m)
  n[i] <- counts[ , 2]
  alpha <- 1 + n
  beta <- state$nu0 + cumsum(c(n[-1], 0))
  stick_break(state$m, alpha, beta)
}

update_theta <- function(x, state) {
  sapply(seq(state$m), function(i) sample_P0_posterior(1, x[state$k == i]),
         simplify = FALSE) %>%
    bind_rows()
}
```

```{r}
sample_P0_prior(1000, mu0 = mean(data$Velocity)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(mu))
```

```{r}
sample_P0_posterior(1000, data$Velocity, mu0 = mean(data$Velocity)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_density(aes(mu))
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

m <- 50
n <- nrow(data)

state <- list(
  nu0 = 1,
  m = m,
  n = n,
  p = rep(1 / m, m),
  k = sample(seq(m), n, replace = TRUE),
  theta = sample_P0_prior(m, mu0 = mean(data$Velocity))
)

k <- update_k(data$Velocity, state)
p <- update_p(data$Velocity, state)
theta <- update_theta(data$Velocity, state)
```
